nodes.text: Victory of the Rebel Alliance was a pro-Rebel Alliance painting created some time during the Galactic Civil War. It depicted three Rebel troopers charging at full speed through a (presumably Imperial-owned) barricade towards the viewer during a firefight, with a downed stormtrooper on the lower left corner. It was sometimes released separately, although a multi-painting version combining it with its pro-Imperial counterpart, Triumph of the Galactic Empire, Forces Under Siege, did exist.

Victory of the Rebel Alliance was awarded to players following the release of Game Update 15. It was a random selection between two paintings for players who reactivated their accounts between February 1 and March 1 (the other painting being Triumph of the Galactic Empire, although players whose accounts were in good standing before February 1 and continued to be in good standing after March 1 were rewarded with both paintings via the multi-painting, as a way to gain both paintings as a bonus. It is the only known painting under the multi-painting category within the game.
The painting has a number of "modes" that can be accessed via the "painting controls" option in the radial menu. These modes are:
